attributes.action: To create an import tax to ensure fair trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to have created an importation tax on products to encourage fair trade both within, and outside the UK. By introducing this tax we would be both safeguarding jobs within the UK, whilst making the UK market a level playing ground. Without doing this we risk the manufacturing future of this country both for now, and the future.
